column3: Automatic sanity-testing: PASSED, see http://jenkins.bluematt.me/pull-tester/1ceff28ca73b528fdc174a6f499e3293ef0d0542 for binaries and test log.\nThis test script verifies pulls every time they are updated. It, however, dies sometimes and fails to test properly.  If you are waiting on a test, please check timestamps to verify that the test.log is moving at http://jenkins.bluematt.me/pull-tester/cu
To make change to the translation files you need to use transifex instead: https://www.transifex.com/projects/p/bitcoin/\n
@thimod Translations are only accepted via Transifex.\n
